content.question: Which of the following describes the most likely cause of death for a citizen of a country in stages 4 and 5 of the demographic transition model?

choices.label: Infectious diseases due to poor sanitation
Degenerative diseases due to old age and lifestyle
Starvation due to an unstable food supply
Infectious diseases due to a lack of vaccines and antibiotics

content.answer: Degenerative diseases due to old age and lifestyle

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe spatial patterns presented in maps and in quantitative and geospatial data.
